Item ID1183

Adamant square shields are the third-strongest square shields in RuneScape, requiring 30 Defence to wield. A player with level 78 Smithing can make the shield by using two adamant bars on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 125 Smithing experience.

This item is used in a medium and hard clue step.

 Attack bonuses

 Defence bonuses
+24+26+22+0+24
